Package frogger.model.actor

Class AutomaticActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • frogger.model.actor.Actor
          • frogger.model.actor.AutomaticActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Car, End, Log, Turtle, WetTurtle
    public abstract class AutomaticActor
extends Actor
    The AutomaticActor is an abstract class which represents the actors which can not controlled by the player. i.e. all actors exclude Frog

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int edgeLeft
      The left edge of the actor.
      private int edgeRight
      The right edge of the actor.
      private double speed
      The horizontal speed of the actor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AutomaticActor

        public AutomaticActor​(java.lang.String imageLink,
                      int xpos,
                      int ypos,
                      int width,
                      int height,
                      double speed)
        Constructs a new AutomaticActor with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        imageLink - the URL of the image of the actor
        xpos - the initial x coordinate of the actor
        ypos - the initial y coordinate of the actor
        width - the width of the actor
        height - the height of the actor
        speed - the horizontal speed of the actor
